installation.script:
# Install curl
apt update
apt install -y curl tar

# Allow sudo run
export RUNNER_ALLOW_RUNASROOT=1

# Go to /mnt/server folder
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Get latest Github Action Runner last release
echo "Fetch last GitHub Action Runner"
RUNNER_VERSION=$(curl -s "https://api.github.com/repos/actions/runner/releases/latest" | grep "tag_name" | cut -d '"' -f 4 | sed 's/^v//')

# Download Github Action Runner release
echo "Downloading action runner (v$RUNNER_VERSION)"
curl -o actions-runner.tar.gz -L https://github.com/actions/runner/releases/download/v$RUNNER_VERSION/actions-runner-linux-x64-$RUNNER_VERSION.tar.gz

# Extract Github Action Runner files
echo "Extract action runner files"
tar xzf ./actions-runner.tar.gz

# Install GitHub Actions dependencies
echo "Download Github Action Runner dependencies"
./bin/installdependencies.sh

# Configure Github Action Runner
echo "Confgiure Github Action Runner"
./config.sh --url https://github.com/${GITHUB_CATEGORY} --token ${GITHUB_ACTION_TOKEN} --name ${GITHUB_ACTION_RUNNER_TOKEN} --unattended

echo -e "Installation complete"
exit 0
